name: Easdigo
description:
Easdigo is just a dungeon game! That's it!

Explore the dungeon, fight enemies and get weapons to fight the boss!

-- HOW TO PLAY --

-- CONTROLS --

Moving - WASD

Aiming - Mouse

Melee - LMB

Ranged - RMB

Dash - Space

Skill Menu - Tab

-- GAMEPLAY --

Chests drop items like powerups and ranged/melee weapons

Enemies are marked as red and are easy to spot

At the end of each dungeon there is a tunnel to the next dungeon floor so look for it carefully
